verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nimeingia (Bwana)
hapa mahali patakatifu.
Unipokee (kwako)
unitakase nipate neema.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nimeingia kwako nimeingia
hapa mahali patakatifu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana mwema wewe
mfadhili sana nakuja
kwako kukutukuza.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nakuabudu pia nakusujudu
nisaidie mimi in wako.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mimi mkristu pokea sala
zangu ninakuomba nisaidie.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nihurumie kwani mimi
mnyonge nategemea
msaada wako.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Unipokee kwako unipokee
unitakase nipate neema.
